title: Arkansas Shack Barbeque SauceArkansas Avalanche
directions: Put the wet stuff in big pot. start it to boil. put dry stuff together and add it to the dry stuff when it begins to boil. turn down to a simmer and simmer 30 minutes. stir often to make sure nothing sticks. This recipe make a lot of sauce.
Pour Goldschlager, Sprite and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass, and serve.
ingredients: 72 ounces hot water (use the ketchup bottles)
